title: Program for Enhancing Mathematical Concept Understanding Through Computer-Based Scientific Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational mathematics knowledge and basic data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, aiming for conceptual expansion through mathematical modeling and empirical data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of scientifically investigating real-world problems using statistical modeling techniques.
Learners can accurately perform hypothesis setting-verification-revision processes in mathematics using simulation tools within an LMS platform with over 80% accuracy.
Through peer feedback systems, learners can improve metacognitive abilities by correcting errors in inquiry processes three or more times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
